name: Woz
headline: AI platform enabling anyone to build and scale software businesses
description:
Woz is an AI platform that enables anyone to build and scale software businesses - no coding required.

Historically, the ability to write code and architect software served as a massive barrier to business building. Woz eliminates this barrier with a team of AI agents that enable anyone, regardless of technical ability, to build products, go to market and grow a business all on one platform without a technical cofounder or inhouse engineering team. 

Our first customers include a personal trainer building a fitness app for his clients, a property manager building a tool for managing security deposits, a doctor launching a coaching program to augment GLP1s and more. Ultimately, Woz aims to be the default platform where millions of AI-enabled entrepreneurs launch and scale businesses.

Woz is built by a team of engineers and ML scientists who've worked together building complex AI systems for the last decade. We're backed by YC, Untapped Ventures, MGV and more.

founders.name: Ben Collins, Founder
founders.description: Cofounder and CEO at Woz. MIT Engineering & Stanford MBA. Previously closed $2M+ in partnerships as startup GTM lead. Led growth at 310.AI where we launched an AI copilot to thousands of scientists in drug discovery.

founders.name: Brad Eckert, Founder
founders.description: Founder/CTO of Woz. Prev Founder & leader of >30 person engineering team at Cairns Health (YC S17, formerly Totemic). Built deep learning radars in consumer electronics for the home environment and an LLM enabled cure for chronic insomnia. MIT EECS, AI Masters dropout, co-author on 25+ patents.

generated_description:
Woz is a fresh face in the tech landscape, founded in 2024 and hailing from San Francisco. Its mission? To democratize software entrepreneurship. With Woz, anyone—yes, anyone—can build and scale a software business without needing to write a single line of code. It’s like giving budding entrepreneurs a magic wand to bring their ideas to life.

Historically, the technical know-how required to build software has been a significant barrier for many aspiring business owners. Woz smashes through that barrier. Utilizing a team of AI agents, the platform empowers users to create products, go to market, and scale their business all from a single platform. Picture this: a personal trainer creating a fitness app, a property manager developing a tool for managing security deposits, and a doctor launching a coaching program—all without needing a tech co-founder or an internal engineering team. 

The company is anchored by a strong team of engineers and machine learning scientists who have honed their craft over a decade. They’re supported by reputable investors, including Y Combinator, Untapped Ventures, and MGV. 

At its core, Woz is tagged with keywords like 'artificial-intelligence', 'saas', 'design', and 'no-code', emphasizing its commitment to making software development accessible. With a compact but driven team of six, Woz is geared up to become the go-to platform for aspiring entrepreneurs looking to jump into the AI-driven future. 

If you find yourself wrestling with coding or seeking an easier way to launch your software business, check out [Woz](https://withwoz.com/) and see how they can help turn your idea into reality in minutes.
